data.title: Lesotho – All Content on this topic – Page 1 of 1 – DW
data.meta_description: Lesotho is a tiny nation in southern Africa that is completely surrounded by South Africa. The majority Christian nation has a population of 2.2 million and gained independence from the UK on October 4, 1966.
data.text: Lesotho is a tiny nation in southern Africa that is completely surrounded by South Africa. The majority Christian nation has a population of 2.2 million and gained independence from the UK on October 4, 1966.
